sentences.en: A crocodile was swimming slowly near the bank with her baby.
sentences.cn: 一条鳄鱼和她的孩子在岸边游泳.

sentences.en: A mother crocodile was looking for food near the bank.
sentences.cn: 鳄鱼妈妈在岸边寻找食物.

sentences.en: Don't shed crocodile tears to me.
sentences.cn: 别在我面前假惺惺的了.

sentences.en: It is actually the possession and retreat of a thundering absolute crocodile.
sentences.cn: 它实际上确是一条庞然大物--鳄鱼--独占的栖所.

sentences.en: The antelope could not escape the crocodile's gaping jaws.
sentences.cn: 那只羚羊无法从鳄鱼张开的大口中逃脱.

sentences.en: The crocodile is a strange - looking creature.
sentences.cn: 鳄鱼是一种模样古怪的动物.

sentences.en: The crocodile killed its prey by keeping it under and drowning it.
sentences.cn: 鳄鱼把它的捕获物按在水下淹死.

sentences.en: The crocodile submerged when It'saw the boat.
sentences.cn: 鳄鱼一看见小船就潜入水中.
α鱼的嘴啪的一声合上了.

sentences.en: The monkey was pleased and jumped onto the crocodile's back.
sentences.cn: 猴子很高兴,就跳到鳄鱼背上.

sentences.en: The sight of George shedding crocodile tears made me sick.
sentences.cn: 看到乔治假慈悲，我感到恶心。

sentences.en: They were only crying crocodile tears at the old man's funeral.
sentences.cn: 他们在那老人葬礼上的哭是虚情假意的.

sentences.en: This is a crocodile - infested swamp.
sentences.cn: 这是一片鳄鱼聚居的沼泽地.

sentences.en: Use the crocodile clips to attach the cables to the battery.
sentences.cn: 用鳄鱼嘴夹把电缆接到蓄电池上。

words.tran_cn: 鳄鱼的；鳄鱼一样的；伪善的

phrases.tran_cn: （过烧钢酸洗后所呈现的）鳄鱼皮（缺陷）

trans.tran_en: a large  reptile  with a long mouth and many sharp teeth that lives in lakes and rivers in hot wet parts of the world
